title: Protocol Relating to the Madrid Agreement Concerning the International Registration of Marks
cleaned_text: The [Madrid System](https://www.wipo.int/madrid/en/) for the International Registration of Marks is governed by the [Madrid Agreement](/treaties/en/registration/madrid/index.html), concluded in 1891, and the Protocol relating to that Agreement, concluded in 1989. The system makes it possible to protect a mark in a large number of countries by obtaining an international registration that has effect in each of the designated Contracting Parties. The
